main.java.com.hexcore.vrmeeting_hostserver.config

Class ProtocolConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.com.hexcore.vrmeeting_hostserver.config.ProtocolConfig

  • public final class ProtocolConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    A class used to store the properties relating to the VRMeeting Messaging Protocol Final so that it cannot be extended
    Author:
    Psymj1 (Marcus)
    See Also:
    VRMeeting Messaging Protocol

      Represents the character(s) which will denote the end of the signal in a message
      static int MAX_BYTES_PER_SIGNAL
      The maximum possible number of bytes that a signal could consist of assuming it is MAX_SIGNAL_LENGTH characters long Defined as MAX_SIGNAL_LENGTH * BYTES_PER_SIGNAL_CHARACTER
      static int MAX_POSSIBLE_SERIALIZED_MESSAGE_LENGTH
      The maximum possible serialized message length is defined as the sum of the MAX_SERIALIZED_SIGNAL_LENGTH + the MAX_SERIALIZED_PAYLOAD_SIZE

      The maximum size of the payload that can be sent and received as denoted by the VRMeeting Messaging Protocol

      The maximum serialized signal length is defined as the MAX_BYTES_PER_SIGNAL + The length of the ENCODED_END_OF_SIGNAL_DELIMITER

      • MAX_BYTES_PER_SIGNAL

        public static final int MAX_BYTES_PER_SIGNAL
        The maximum possible number of bytes that a signal could consist of assuming it is MAX_SIGNAL_LENGTH characters long Defined as MAX_SIGNAL_LENGTH * BYTES_PER_SIGNAL_CHARACTER
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MAX_SERIALIZED_SIGNAL_LENGTH

        public static final int MAX_SERIALIZED_SIGNAL_LENGTH
        The maximum serialized signal length is defined as the MAX_BYTES_PER_SIGNAL + The length of the ENCODED_END_OF_SIGNAL_DELIMITER

      • MAX_SERIALIZED_PAYLOAD_SIZE

        public static final int MAX_SERIALIZED_PAYLOAD_SIZE
        The maximum size of the payload that can be sent and received as denoted by the VRMeeting Messaging Protocol
        See Also:
        VRMeeting Messaging Protocol, Constant Field Values

      • MAX_POSSIBLE_SERIALIZED_MESSAGE_LENGTH

        public static final int MAX_POSSIBLE_SERIALIZED_MESSAGE_LENGTH
        The maximum possible serialized message length is defined as the sum of the MAX_SERIALIZED_SIGNAL_LENGTH + the MAX_SERIALIZED_PAYLOAD_SIZE

      • BYTES_PER_AUDIO_SAMPLE

        public static final int BYTES_PER_AUDIO_SAMPLE
        Represents the number of bytes per audio sample in an audio transmission message. Used to check the integrity of messages claiming to be transmitting audio

        Constant Field Values
